sources.title: Riders of the Sage
sources.description: In an effort to get Jim Martin (Frank LaRue) to sell his ranch, the Halsey brothers have kidnapped his son Tom (Dave O'Brien). When Bob Burke (Bob Steele) goes after him alone, he gets help from the gang known as the Riders of the Sage.

sources.title: Riders of the Sage (1939) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Claire Rochelle, Ralph Hoopes
 Director: Harry S. Webb

 In an effort to get Jim Martin to sell his ranch, the Halsey brothers have kidnapped his son Tom. When Bob Burke goes after him alone, he gets help from the gang known as the Riders of the Sage.

metadata.Plot: In an effort to get Jim Martin to sell his ranch, the Halsey brothers have kidnapped his son Tom. When Bob Burke goes after him alone, he gets help from the gang known as the Riders of the Sage.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Claire Rochelle, Ralph Hoopes
